/* ========================================================================== VARIABLE DEV ============================================================================= <Variable name="keycolor" description="Main Color" type="color" default="#fffacc" value="#676451"/>
<Group description="Body" selector="body"> <Variable name="body.background.color" description="body.background.color" type="color" default="#fffacc" value="#fff6bd"/> </Group> <Variable name="body.background" description="body.background" type="background" color="$(body.background.color)" default="$(color) none no-repeat fixed center center" value="#676451 url(//themes.googleusercontent.com/image?id=0BwVBOzw_-hbMMDYxYTU0MmQtZTA5Yi00MTIwLTk3ZjktZWI4MzJhMDQyOTIy) repeat-x fixed top center /* Credit: Sookhee Lee */"/>
<Group description="text.color" selector="body"> <Variable name="body.text.color" description="body.text.color" type="color" default="#000" value="#000000"/> </Group>
<Group description="link.color" selector="body"> <Variable name="link.color" description="link.color" type="color" default="#4285f4" value="#2077f2"/> <Variable name="link.color.hover" description="link.color.hover" type="color" default="#111" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="link.color.visited" description="link.color.visited" type="color" default="#6d1dec" value="#4e10c3"/> </Group>
<Group description="primary.color" selector="primary.color"> <Variable name="primary.color" description="primary.color" type="color" default="#03a9f4" value="#0283b3"/> <Variable name="second.color" description="second.color" type="color" default="#FFF" value="#ffffff"/> </Group> ========================================================================== */
/* ========================================================================== BLOGGER #LAYOUT ========================================================================== */ body#layout .hidden{ display:initial; } body#layout #contact,body#layout #reset{ display:none; }
body{font-family:'Open Sans',sans-serif;background:$(body.background);margin:0;padding:0;font-size:14px;color:#111;width:100%;height:100%;min-height:100vh}.h1,.h2,.h3,h1,h2,h3{font-family:'Oswald',sans-serif;font-weight:400}.container{width:100%;max-width:860px;position:relative;padding-bottom:15px}#content{position:relative;min-height:620px}.copyright-text{float:right;margin-right:15px;margin-top:0}.abs-child{position:relative}.hidden{display:none}.clear{clear:both}.large-paragraph{font-size:14px;line-height:1.7em;letter-spacing:.02em}.large-paragraph,.focus-text{color:#666}.no-padding{list-style:none;padding-left:0}.right-align{text-align:right}.center-align{text-align:center}.frontclick{position:absolute;max-width:37px;bottom:16px;left:50%;transform:translateX(-50%);bottom:15px;opacity:0;transition:all.3s}.frontclick.active{opacity:1}.pulse{background:rgba(0,0,0,0);border-radius:50%;height:14px;width:14px;position:absolute;margin:11px 0 0px-12px;-webkit-transform:rotateX(55deg);-moz-transform:rotateX(55deg);-o-transform:rotateX(55deg);-ms-transform:rotateX(55deg);transform:rotateX(55deg);z-index:-2;top:0;left:4px}.pulse:after{content:"";border-radius:50%;height:40px;width:40px;position:absolute;margin:-13px 0 0-13px;-webkit-animation:pulsate 1s ease-out;-moz-animation:pulsate 1s ease-out;-o-animation:pulsate 1s ease-out;-ms-animation:pulsate 1s ease-out;animation:pulsate 1s ease-out;-webkit-animation-iteration-count:infinite;-moz-animation-iteration-count:infinite;-o-animation-iteration-count:infinite;-ms-animation-iteration-count:infinite;animation-iteration-count:infinite;opacity:0;-ms-filter:"progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Alpha(Opacity=0)";filter:alpha(opacity=0);-webkit-box-shadow:0 0 1px 2px #bdbdbd;box-shadow:0 0 1px 2px #bdbdbd;-webkit-animation-delay:1.1s;-moz-animation-delay:1.1s;-o-animation-delay:1.1s;-ms-animation-delay:1.1s;animation-delay:1.1s}@-moz-keyframes pulsate{0%{-webkit-transform:scale(.1,.1);-moz-transform:scale(.1,.1);-o-transform:scale(.1,.1);-ms-transform:scale(.1,.1);transform:scale(.1,.1);opacity:0;-ms-filter:"progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Alpha(Opacity=0)";filter:alpha(opacity=0)}50%{opacity:1;-ms-filter:none;filter:none}100%{-webkit-transform:scale(1.2,1.2);-moz-transform:scale(1.2,1.2);-o-transform:scale(1.2,1.2);-ms-transform:scale(1.2,1.2);transform:scale(1.2,1.2);opacity:0;-ms-filter:"progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Alpha(Opacity=0)";filter:alpha(opacity=0)}}@-webkit-keyframes pulsate{0%{-webkit-transform:scale(.1,.1);-moz-transform:scale(.1,.1);-o-transform:scale(.1,.1);-ms-transform:scale(.1,.1);transform:scale(.1,.1);opacity:0;-ms-filter:"progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Alpha(Opacity=0)";filter:alpha(opacity=0)}50%{opacity:1;-ms-filter:none;filter:none}100%{-webkit-transform:scale(1.2,1.2);-moz-transform:scale(1.2,1.2);-o-transform:scale(1.2,1.2);-ms-transform:scale(1.2,1.2);transform:scale(1.2,1.2);opacity:0;-ms-filter:"progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Alpha(Opacity=0)";filter:alpha(opacity=0)}}@-o-keyframes pulsate{0%{-webkit-transform:scale(.1,.1);-moz-transform:scale(.1,.1);-o-transform:scale(.1,.1);-ms-transform:scale(.1,.1);transform:scale(.1,.1);opacity:0;-ms-filter:"progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Alpha(Opacity=0)";filter:alpha(opacity=0)}50%{opacity:1;-ms-filter:none;filter:none}100%{-webkit-transform:scale(1.2,1.2);-moz-transform:scale(1.2,1.2);-o-transform:scale(1.2,1.2);-ms-transform:scale(1.2,1.2);transform:scale(1.2,1.2);opacity:0;-ms-filter:"progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Alpha(Opacity=0)";filter:alpha(opacity=0)}}@keyframes pulsate{0%{-webkit-transform:scale(.1,.1);-moz-transform:scale(.1,.1);-o-transform:scale(.1,.1);-ms-transform:scale(.1,.1);transform:scale(.1,.1);opacity:0;-ms-filter:"progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Alpha(Opacity=0)";filter:alpha(opacity=0)}50%{opacity:1;-ms-filter:none;filter:none}100%{-webkit-transform:scale(1.2,1.2);-moz-transform:scale(1.2,1.2);-o-transform:scale(1.2,1.2);-ms-transform:scale(1.2,1.2);transform:scale(1.2,1.2);opacity:0;-ms-filter:"progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.Alpha(Opacity=0)";filter:alpha(opacity=0)}}h1{font-size:45px}h2{font-size:30px}h3{font-size:24px}h4{font-size:15px}h5{font-size:13px}h6{font-size:12px}h3.title{font-size:21px}h1{color:$(primary.color);display:inline-block;text-transform:uppercase;position:relative}h2{color:$(primary.color);position:relative}h3{position:relative;margin-bottom:20px}.invert{color:$(primary.color)}strong{font-weight:700;color:#333}span.year{color:#F9BF3B;float:right}.form-group{margin-bottom:10px}.form-control{border-radius:0;padding:2px 6px}.btn{padding:2px 25px;border-radius:0}.btn-success{background:$(primary.color);border-color:$(primary.color);width:100%;color:$(second.color);font-family:'Oswald',sans-serif;font-size:18px}.btn-success.active,.btn-success.focus,.btn-success:active,.btn-success:focus,.btn-success:hover,.open>.dropdown-toggle.btn-success{opacity:.9;background:$(primary.color);border-color:$(primary.color)}.form-control:focus{border-color:#888;outline:0;box-shadow:none;-webkit-box-shadow:none}.modal-content{border-radius:3px;border:8px solid $(primary.color);box-shadow:0 0 7px rgb(0,0,0)}.modal-body{padding:20px}.modal-header{background-color:$(second.color);border-bottom:none;padding:13px 20px 22px}.modal-footer{padding:20px;border-top:0;padding-top:0}.modal-title{display:inline-block;font-family:'Oswald',sans-serif;font-size:24px;margin-bottom:-10px;color:#fff}.close{color:#fff;text-shadow:none}.modal-header.close{background:rgba(255,0,0,.83);opacity:1;width:30px;height:30px;border-radius:100%;margin-top:3px}.transparent{opacity:0;-khtml-opacity:0;-moz-opacity:0;filter:alpha(opacity=0)}.loading-screen{position:fixed;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;z-index:9999;background:url(https://loading.io/spinners/typing/lg.-text-entering-comment-loader.gif)center no-repeat #FFF}#frontpage{position:relative;width:550px;background-color:#666;text-align:right;padding:15px;margin:0 auto;cursor:pointer}.front-img{width:100%;min-height:150px;background-color:$(primary.color);text-align:center;position:relative}#namecard{position:relative;background-color:$(second.color);height:50%;min-height:285px;text-align:center;padding:15px;margin:0;margin-bottom:15px}.namecard,.namecard h1{font-family:'Oswald',sans-serif}.profile-img{position:relative;width:140px;height:140px;border-radius:70px;float:none;overflow:hidden;background-color:#fff;border:7px solid $(primary.color);z-index:100;opacity:1;-khtml-opacity:1;-moz-opacity:1;filter:alpha(opacity=100);transition:opacity 1s ease-in-out;-moz-transition:opacity 1s ease-in-out;-webkit-transition:opacity 1s ease-in-out}#menu-container{position:relative;display:block;clear:both;background-color:$(primary.color);height:50%;min-height:323px;text-align:right;padding:15px 0;margin:0}ul.nav-menu li{position:relative;padding:12px 15px;width:100%;color:$(second.color);border-bottom:1px solid $(second.color);font-size:16px;margin:0;cursor:pointer;overflow:hidden}.hover-background{position:absolute;background-color:$(second.color);z-index:-1;width:300%;height:300%;top:200%;left:-100%;-ms-transform:rotate(15deg);-webkit-transform:rotate(15deg);-moz-transform:rotate(15deg);transform:rotate(15deg);-webkit-transition:top 0.5s,left 0.5s;-moz-transition:top 0.5s,left 0.5s;-o-transition:top 0.5s,left 0.5s;transition-timing-function:ease-out;transition:top 0.5s,left 0.5s}ul.nav-menu li:hover{border-bottom-color:$(second.color);color:$(second.color)}ul.nav-menu li:hover.hover-background,ul.nav-menu li.selected.hover-background{top:0%;left:-15%}ul.nav-menu li.selected{background-color:$(second.color);border-bottom-color:$(second.color);border-right:none;color:$(primary.color)}ul.nav-menu li span{padding-right:25px;border-right:2px solid $(second.color);margin-right:15px;}ul.nav-menu li:hover span,ul.nav-menu li.selected span{border-right:2px solid $(second.color)}.social-menu-container{position:absolute;bottom:10px;right:0;left:0;text-align:center}.social-menu-container.title{margin-bottom:5px;padding-right:15px;color:$(second.color)}.social-menu{display:inline-block;float:none;font-size:18px;margin-right:5px;padding:0 !important} .social-menu a{float:left;width:40px;height:40px;text-align:center;border-radius:20px;cursor:pointer;transition:all 0.1s ease-in;-webkit-transition:all 0.1s ease-in;color:$(second.color);} .social-menu li.facebook{background:#3b5999}.social-menu li.youtube{background:#cd201f}.social-menu li.twitter{background:#55acee}.social-menu li.instagram{background:#e4405f}.social-menu li.rssfeed{background:#f57d00} .social-menu li{float:left;margin:0 5px} .social-menu li i{margin-top:33%}.page-segment{padding-left:0}.title-container{position:relative;height:147px;background-color:$(primary.color);/*margin-bottom:15px*/;padding:15px;padding-left:25px;z-index:100}.title-container h2{bottom:15px;position:absolute;color:$(second.color)}.sm-title{font-weight:600}h1.maintitle{margin-bottom:3px}.sub-maintitle{margin-top:0}.description{height:475px;position:relative;background-color:#fff;padding:15px 30px;overflow:hidden}.description p{margin:15px 0;padding-right:75px}.strong-text{font-family:'Oswald',sans-serif;display:inline-block;font-size:22.5px;margin:10px 0}.strong-text span{background:$(primary.color);padding:2px 5px;padding-bottom:2px;color:$(second.color);margin-left:5px}.fade-text{opacity:1;-khtml-opacity:1;-moz-opacity:1;filter:alpha(opacity=100);transition:opacity 0.75s ease-in;-moz-transition:opacity 0.75s ease-in;-webkit-transition:opacity 0.75s ease-in}.rotate-out{-webkit-transform:rotateX(0deg);transform:rotateX(0deg);transition:all 0.5s ease-in;-moz-transition:all 0.5s ease-in;-webkit-transition:all 0.5s ease-in}.rotated{-webkit-transform:rotateX(-90deg);transform:rotateX(-90deg)}.focus-text span{font-size:16px;font-weight:600}.page-container.selected{display:block}.btn-downloadcv{position:relative;top:30px;background:$(primary.color);color:$(second.color);display:block;width:200px;padding:10px;border-radius:4px;margin:auto}.watermark-home{width:321px;height:343px;position:absolute;bottom:0;right:15px;background:url('')no-repeat;background-size:contain;background-position:right}.personal-info-title{font-size:22.5px;margin-top:65px}.personal-info{list-style:none;padding:0 !important}ul.personal-info li{margin-bottom:9px;padding-left:75px;position:relative;font-size:12.5px}.personal-info span{background:$(primary.color);padding:4px 10px 5px;color:$(second.color);display:inline-block;margin-left:9px;text-transform:capitalize}.personal-info label{position:absolute;left:0;width:80px;top:0;bottom:0;min-width:75px;font-size:12.5px;font-weight:600;background:$(primary.color);color:$(second.color);margin-right:10px;padding:4px 10px 5px;margin:0}.tabs{position:relative}.tabs.horizontal{margin:30px-30px;margin-top:0;padding:10px 0;display:block;min-height:50px;position:relative;top:-30px}.tabs.horizontal li a{width:33.3%;border-right:3px solid #fff;margin:0;padding:24px 0 19px;float:left;text-align:center;background-color:$(second.color);color:$(primary.color);transition:background-color 0.3s ease-in;-webkit-transition:background-color 0.3s ease-in;font-size:16px;font-family:Oswald}.tabs.horizontal li:last-child a{border-right:none}.icon-bg{background-image:url(../images/resume/skills.html);background-position:left;-webkit-background-size:contain;background-size:contain;background-repeat:no-repeat}.icon-skills{background-image:url(../images/resume/icon_01.png)}.icon-education{background-image:url(../images/resume/icon_02.html)}.icon-employment{background-image:url(../images/resume/icon_03.png)}.tabs.horizontal li a:hover,.tabs.horizontal li.active a{background-color:$(primary.color);text-decoration:none;color:$(second.color)}.tab-cont{position:relative;height:300px;overflow-y:scroll}.tab-cont.row{margin-left:0;margin-right:0}.employment-class,.education-class{list-style:none;padding-left:0}.employment-class li{position:relative;margin-bottom:15px;background-color:$(second.color);padding:15px;color:#F7EFE2}.employment-class li h4{color:#F7EFE2;font-size:13px;font-weight:400;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:5px}.employment-class li h5{color:$(primary.color);margin-top:5px;font-weight:700}.employment-class li p{margin:0 0 10px;font-size:12px}.employment-class li:last-child:after{display:none}.education-class li>.title{background-color:$(second.color);padding:10px;font-size:15px;font-weight:600;color:$(primary.color);cursor:pointer}.education-class>li.current>.title{background-color:$(primary.color);color:$(second.color)}.education-class h4 i{font-size:16px}.education-class h4 i.fa-sort-desc{position:relative;top:-5px}.education-class.list-content{color:#666;padding:0 15px;height:0;-webkit-transition:height 0.5s;-moz-transition:height 0.5s;-o-transition:height 0.5s;transition:height 0.5s;overflow:hidden}.list-content>.title{font-weight:700}.list-year{font-style:italic;margin-left:5px}.education-class.current.list-content{height:110px}.education-class.current i{color:$(second.color)}.skills-list li{margin-bottom:10px}.bar{background:#fff6da;padding-left:0;height:25px;overflow:hidden;width:100%;max-width:350px;position:relative}.percentage{width:50%;height:100%}.circle-skill-container{max-width:395px;padding:5px;padding-left:0}.circle-skill-container h5{margin-top:10px;font-weight:600;text-transform:uppercase}.circle-bar{position:relative;margin:5px auto}.circle-bar>svg{height:100%;display:block}.circle-bar.progressbar-text{font-size:12.5px;position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;padding:0;margin:0;-webkit-transform:translate(-50%,-50%);transform:translate(-50%,-50%);color:$(second.color)}.contact-form-error-message-with-border{margin-top:10px !important;padding:.75rem 1.25rem;margin-bottom:1rem;border:1px solid transparent;border-radius:.25rem;background-color:#fcf8e3;border-color:#faf2cc;color:#8a6d3b}.contact-form-success-message-with-border{margin-top:20px;padding:.75rem 1.25rem;margin-bottom:1rem;border:1px solid transparent;border-radius:.25rem;background-color:#dff0d8;border-color:#d0e9c6;color:#3c763d}.contact-form-error-message-with-border img,.contact-form-success-message-with-border img{float:right;margin-top:7px}.contact-form-error-message-with-border,.contact-form-success-message-with-border{margin-top:20px}.sec-porfolio.description{padding:70px 34px 15px 40px}.button-group.filters-button-group{position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;z-index:1}.button-group{list-style:none;padding-left:0;width:100%;margin:0;display:table}.button-group.button{text-align:center;float:left;width:25%;background:$(second.color);border-right:2px solid #fff;color:$(primary.color);padding:12px 0;cursor:pointer;transition:background-color 0.5s ease-in;-webkit-transition:background-color 0.5s ease-in}.filters-button-group li{font-size:16px}.button-group.button.is-checked{color:#111;background-color:$(primary.color)}.demo-2 .button-group.button.is-checked{color:#2C3E50;background-color:$(primary.color)}.demo-2 .button-group.button{background:#2C3E50}.button-group.button:hover{background-color:$(primary.color);color:#fff}.folio-container{height:380px;overflow-y:scroll;padding-bottom:40px}.folio-item{position:relative;list-style:none;padding-left:0}.view{margin:1px;float:left;overflow:hidden;position:relative;text-align:center;width:32.5%;height:150px;cursor:default;background:#242424 no-repeat center center}.view.mask,.view.content{width:100%;height:100%;position:absolute;overflow:hidden;top:0;left:0}.view img{display:block;position:relative;width:auto;max-width:100%;height:100%}.view h2{text-transform:uppercase;border-bottom:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.3);color:#fff;text-align:center;position:relative;font-size:17px;padding:10px;margin:20px 40px 0 40px}.view a.info{display:inline-block;text-decoration:none;padding:7px 14px;background:#000;color:#fff;text-transform:uppercase;box-shadow:0 0 1px #000;margin-top:10px}.view a.info:hover{box-shadow:0 0 5px #000;background-color:$(primary.color);color:#212129}.view-first img{transition:all 0.2s linear}.view-first.mask{opacity:0;background-color:rgba(12,19,27,.6);transition:all 0.4s ease-in-out}.view-first h2{transform:translateY(-100px);opacity:0;transition:all 0.2s ease-in-out}.view-first a.info{opacity:0;transition:all 0.2s ease-in-out}.view-first:hover img{transform:scale(1.1)}.view-first:hover.mask{opacity:1}.view-first:hover h2,.view-first:hover p,.view-first:hover a.info{opacity:1;transform:translateY(0)}.view-first:hover a.info{transition-delay:0.2s}.view-second img{transition:all 0.2s ease-in;-webkit-transition:all 0.2s ease-in}.view-second.mask{background-color:rgba(12,19,27,.6);width:100%;padding:260px;height:100%;opacity:0;transform:translate(265px,145px)rotate(45deg);-webkit-transform:translate(265px,145px)rotate(45deg);transition:all 0.2s ease-in-out;-webkit-transition:all 0.2s ease-in-out}.view-second h2{background:transparent;-webkit-transform:translate(200px,-200px);transform:translate(200px,-200px);-webkit-transition:all 0.2s ease-in-out;transition:all 0.2s ease-in-out}.view-second a.info{transform:translate(0,160px);-webkit-transform:translate(0,160px);transition:all 0.2s 0.1s ease-in-out;-webkit-transition:all 0.2s 0.1s ease-in-out}.view-second:hover.mask{opacity:1;transform:translate(-80px,-125px)rotate(45deg);-webkit-transform:translate(-80px,-125px)rotate(45deg)}.view-second:hover h2{transform:translate(0,0);-webkit-transform:translate(0,0);transition-delay:0.3s;-webkit-transition-delay:0.3s}.view-second:hover a.info{transform:translate(0,0);-webkit-transform:translate(0,0);transition-delay:0.5s;-webkit-transition-delay:0.5s}.view-tenth img{transform:scaleY(1);transition:all.7s ease-in-out}.view-tenth.mask{background-color:rgba(12,19,27,.6);transition:all 0.5s linear;opacity:0}.view-tenth h2{background:transparent;margin:20px 40px 0 40px;transform:scale(0);color:#fff;transition:all 0.5s linear;opacity:0}.view-tenth a.info{opacity:0;transform:scale(0);transition:all 0.5s linear}.view-tenth:hover img{-webkit-transform:scale(10);transform:scale(10);opacity:0}.view-tenth:hover.mask{opacity:1}.view-tenth:hover h2,.view-tenth:hover p,.view-tenth:hover a.info{transform:scale(1);opacity:1}.mf-content{text-align:left}@media(max-width:767px){.view{width:49%;height:210px}.category-nav li{width:50%}.folio-container{height:auto;overflow:hidden}}@media(max-width:460px){.view{width:47%;height:160px}}.mobile-nav-container{background-color:$(second.color);margin:15px 0;display:none}.mobile-social{float:right;width:auto;color:$(primary.color);font-size:15px;margin-bottom:0}.mobile-social li{float:left;margin:10px 5px}.mobile-social a{background:$(primary.color);color:$(second.color);padding:2px 8px}.mobile-social a:hover{color:$(second.color)}@media(max-width:767px){body{height:auto;overflow-y:scroll}#frontpage{width:auto;text-align:center;margin:0 15px}#namecard{text-align:center}.profile-img{float:none;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto}.page-segment{padding-left:15px;margin-top:15px}#menu-container{min-height:60px;padding:0}ul.nav-menu li span{display:none}ul.nav-menu li{width:16.66%;margin:0;padding:15px;font-size:19px;float:left;text-align:center;border-right:1px solid $(second.color);border-bottom:none}ul.nav-menu li.selected{border-bottom:3px solid $(second.color);border-right:none}.hover-background{top:200%;left:-50%}ul.nav-menu li:hover.hover-background{left:-25%}.social-menu-container{position: relative; bottom: 0; top: 10px;}.description{height:525px !important}.tab-cont{height:auto;overflow:hidden}.circle-bar{margin-bottom:25px;max-height:110px}.education-class.current.list-content{height:130px}.map-container{margin:0}.mobile-nav-container{display:block}.mobile-social{float:none}} .description ul {padding: 0 20px;}

<!--PROFILE NAME--> <h3 class="invert sub-maintitle"> <span class="rotate">One, Two, Three</span> </h3> <img id="profile-img" class="profile-img" src="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qLyiIHasEUE/Wehu9vCD3lI/AAAAAAAAAcg/Pw1HqTOzJHk39aApeZ10l6hpD9pWkTFAgCLcBGAs/s320/22641923_144379016181440_712767332_o.jpg" alt="profile-image"/>
<a target='_blank' href='http://bit.ly/cvgdirfaan' class='btn-downloadcv'><i class='fa fa-cloud-download'/> Download CV</i></a> <!--PROFILE IMAGE-->

Kontak
Profile
<div class="description">
<div class="fade-text"> <!--DESCRIPTION ON HOME--> <div class="strong-text">Hai, Nama saya <span>Irfan</span></div> <div class="focus-text"><span>saya berasal dari cibinong-bogor, jawabarat. saya adalah anak ke-3 dari 4 bersaudara, umur saya sekarang 18tahun, salam persahabatan dari saya, irfan.</span></div> <!-- <p class="large-paragraph"></p> --> <!--DESCRIPTION ON HOME ENDS--> </div>
